attributes.action: Stop free child care for MPs
attributes.additional_details: IPSA have said they will accept claims
attributes.background: IPSA have said they will accept claims from MPs to cover childcare cost to cover Saturdays sitting. Other parents have to find the cost from their own pockets. Yet MPs have asked for the cost to be funded from tax payers again. Disgraceful

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
